experience: You and Elle both know Eric Keosky-Smith, Trish Bear, and 79 others
Arizona Republic, Beatitudes Campus, Lyft executives honored with ATHENA awards
How many times do colleagues become enemies?
I've had to remind myself that for some, work is just a job and for some, work is a calling.
And for others still, work is somewhere in between.
The bonds of affection must be the purpose that connects all of us to each other, acting as a tie that binds us together and reminds us of our humanity when the daily grind threatens to wear us thin.
So today, I penned this purpose statement for Launch Forth
At Launch Forth, we are in pursuit of products.
We exist to design the products of tomorrow, today.
We believe it’s worthy work to connect more people to the product development process, to empower their ideas and solutions.
We believe in and fight for greatness in the product design process.
That’s the work we do every day.

“We are not enemies, but friends. We must not be enemies. Though passion may have strained, it must not break our bonds of affection. The mystic chords of memory will swell when again touched, as surely they will be, by the better angels of our nature.”
Hi, my name is Elle and my dream super power is ________.

At Launch Forth, we start our client engagements with workshops. To help break the ice, we do introductions but with a little twist. We pair the classic "Hi my name is ____", with an unexpected question to help everyone tell a little story about him or herself. Earlier this week, when kicking off an engagement with the US Marine Corps in Washington D.C., we asked the team to tell us what their dream super power would be. I loved hearing the answers – everything from time travel to mind control to flying. I got inspired by that question and have started asking everyone this one question. So, let’s get re-acquainted. Tell me your name and dream super power!
And if you want to team with us as we co-create with the Marines, click the link and join:

Agile Program Manager at BlueGrace Logistics
March 3, 2015, Jennifer reported directly to Elle

Elle is a top notch strategist, she knows marketing and PR like the back of her hand. I joined her team knowing little about marketing strategy. Since then, I have learned an invaluable amount about brand strategy and marketing tactics, and also how they all work together to create effective campaigns. Elle is extremely creative, knowledgeable, high energy, positive, and passionate about what she does. All of those qualities show in the strategic, effective, and comprehensive marketing campaigns she delivers. I would highly recommend Elle to build or market a brand -- I don't know anyone who has a better command of the marketing, PR, and strategy world.

Rod Lenniger
Owner, RAL Advisory Services
December 29, 2014, Elle was a client of Rod’s

Elle is one of the most strategically sound marketing professionals I've worked with. I had the opportunity to assist her with positioning what was at the time, a new digital strategic marketing agency, secure growth funding and eventually help support a successful merger into another organization. During this time, I had the opportunity to accompany her on several business development interactions and was continuously impressed with her ability to quickly grasp new clients business model and make excellent strategic suggestions on the spot. Her high energy style and special business acumen makes prospects and clients comfortable and confident right out of the gate. She leveraged her unique abilities to build a new kind of strategic agency from the ground up, acquire excellent clients and achieve financial success in less than 6 months. She has succeeded as an individual contributor, a functional manager and as an entrepreneur/business owner bringing value to start-ups, SMB's and an "intrapreneuring" venture emerging from a F500 giant. Now as CMO of a fast growing innovative, national organization, she continues to build upon past successes to have an impact in an even broader realm of business. I can highly recommend her as a business savvy marketer with remarkable strategic capabilities.
Rod Lenniger

Elle has served as a digital marketing consultant to our e-commerce startup for almost 3 years now. Though digital marketing is her primary focus, Elle is truly an expert in all forms of marketing. She led us from zero to launch and beyond with a seamless strategy encompassing all forms of social and print media. Though full of energy and ideas, she has always been sensitive to the budgetary realities of a startup, with a talent for stretching the marketing dollar. Always personable and engaging, Elle has been, and will continue to be, an irreplaceable and highly valued member of our team.

I have had the opportunity to work with many 3rd party professional services personnel over the years.  Few have shown themselves to operate at the elevated level Elle does each and every day.  When engaging with clients Elle is well prepared and ready to give 100% to the task at hand, contributing ideas and insight to ensure delivery of the best possible end product.  When the required information is not readily at hand, without delay Elle will do the research, analyze the information and create a viable action plan.  Over the course of our project Elle has demonstrated herself to be a consummate professional with the knowledge, skills and abilities to deliver value to any project she undertakes.

Candice Wood
Assistant Medical Director, The Women's Center
March 28, 2013, Candice was a client of Elle’s

My husband and I have worked with Elle for over two years and feel lucky that we are still one of her clients.  Aside from her expertise in the world of strategy and marketing, Elle is a pleasure to work with.  Know that after she pitches her ideas for your project you will be sold and later wonder if you just got taken because it all may seem to good to be true.  From our experience she always delivers what she says and more.  She is so vested in her projects that she will feel more like a business partner than a consultant.  Her best quality is her integrity.  She has seen us through many difficult situations that others would have taken advantage of and assured themselves an undue profit.  In every circumstance, Elle does what is right for the client even at her own expense.  Integrity is almost impossible to find and parred with her creative instinct and understanding of how to speak to potential consumers, a strategist like Elle cannot be found. Our hope would be to offer Elle a permanent position as soon as we can afford her.

Entrepreneur/Advisor to Startups & Fast-Growing Companies/Venture Partner
March 28, 2013, Alan was a client of Elle’s

We tasked Elle and her firm with a difficult challenge: Turn our ideas for a complex SaaS application into simple, compelling screens with a front-end that would convert visitors to the Web site into users of our application. Elle's knowledge of consumers' habits on the Internet has been instrumental in our decision making, and her communication skills have ensured that the project has run smoothly and without uncomfortable surprises. Elle is delightful to work with, possessing a rare combination of client empathy, subject mastery, a confident and highly personable demeanor, and the poise to remain pleasant and serene even as clients such as ourselves navigate a circuitous path toward meeting our objectives.

He will be greatly missed on the team but it will be quite fun to watch Chance grow!

September 26, 2017, Elle managed Aaron directly

It's rare that you find someone as hardworking, smart and, most importantly, versatile as Aaron. I had the opportunity of having Aaron on my team for more than a year. During that time, he jumped headfirst in numerous roles  -- from setting up an enterprise CRM to taking over and turning around a distressed project.  He leads with kindness and candor and is relentless in finding ways to work around problems.  I admire his strong business acumen and interpersonal skills that allow him to command a room of top-tier executives and get them onboard with big ideas and bold plans of action. As a team member or a leader, Aaron earns my highest recommendation.

summary: A classically trained marketer, Elle spent the early parts of her career managing integrated advertising initiatives, successfully marrying digital and social media, PR and traditional advertising. She then went on to launch her own marketing agency in 2012 to focus on startups -- app development, websites, brand campaigns, and social initiatives -- which merged with Local Motors in late 2013. Well known for her signature enthusiasm and creativity, Elle spends her days, nights and weekends dreaming up marketing strategies that drive growth and accelerate co-creation. A graduate of ASU’s W.P. Carey School of Business, Elle is an iron pumping, EV-driving, yoga loving, classically-trained violinist that is also fluent in Spanish. She is a firm believer in high heels, the power of collaboration and shared moments of innovation, especially when they happen over a cup of coffee.
name: Elle Shelley
title: Wake up. Be brilliant. Smile.
